tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Al Pacino on Wilde Salome @ Venice Film Festival Part 2
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
http://myetvmedia.com/feature/events/al-pacino-on-wilde-salome-venice-international-film-festival-2/ Al Pacino on Wilde Salome and the Lifetime Achievement Award at the press conference at the Venice International Film Festival.
Copyright Disclaimer, Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for 'fair use' for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: FICTION/DRAMA
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Programme consisting of a prose or verse composition, resp. one telling a story, written for or as if for performance by actors, puppets or animated

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: I was in Venice last sept. 4 to see Wilde Salome. I found it very interesting,enjoyable and most of all unexpected.Mr. pacino put togheter Wilde's play Salomè,Wilde the writer and himself.Mr.Pacino is so﻿ charismatic,as always,that he succeeds in involving you in his own vision.His research doesn't seem ended. Fascinating journey .
